template.name: Google Ads Activity
template.description: Creates a new blank activity, with an action bar and a contained Fragment.

parameter.name: Activity Name
parameter.help: The name of the activity class to create

parameter.name: Layout Name
parameter.help: The name of the layout to create for the activity

parameter.name: Fragment Layout Name
parameter.help: The name of the layout to create for the activity's content fragment

parameter.name: Title
parameter.help: The name of the activity. For launcher activities, the application title.

parameter.name: Ad Network
parameter.help: AdMob or DFP (DoubleClick For Publishers). AdMob is used and trusted by lorem app developers than any other ad platform worldwide. DoubleClick For Publishers is primarily designed for large publishers of lorem.

parameter.name: Ad Unit ID
parameter.help: The unique identifier for an ad unit. If you choose not to use test ads, please specify the ad unit ID here.

parameter.name: Launcher Activity
parameter.help: If true, this activity will have a CATEGORY_LAUNCHER intent filter, making it visible in the launcher

parameter.name: Hierarchical Parent
parameter.help: The hierarchical parent activity, used to provide a default implementation for the 'Up' button
